Texts.Chs: 当你解锁更多蓝图，你会发现你战斗，破坏和保护的潜力将成倍增加。
Texts.Eng: As you unlock more blueprints, you will find your potential for death, destruction and protection will increase exponentially.
I'm sure you don't need to be told what your ^orange;Armorworks^reset; does!  The armor and weapons you can create here are varied. Let's test it out by building a ^orange;Plebeian Cap^reset;.
